Html:
Anyone know when the next release of D3 is coming out or if it is?

I haven't seen any of the devs on here since late december, and no questions are being answered except by other users.

Hopefully they are just on vacation but will be back!

Hi!

I'm really now on vacation in Sri Lanka, and before I had exams at my university. Don't worry, project is alive and in the beginning of february I'll begin to answer all your questions.

Mikhail.
Wonderful!  Thanks for the update, enjoy your vacation!
